tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP have) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB wear) (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS glasses)) (NP (NN today) (NN :-LRB-)) (NP-TMP (NP (DT no) (NNS contacts)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NNS 24hrs))))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [have/VBP nsubj>I/PRP xcomp>[wear/VB mark>to/TO dep>[glasses/NNS nmod:poss>my/PRP$] dobj>[:-LRB-/NN compound>today/NN] nmod:tmod>[contacts/NNS neg>no/DT nmod:for>[24hrs/NNS case>for/IN]]]]
